alert.note: Alert for Gates; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Perquimans and central Gates Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sunbury, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Rain 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Possible flooding of low lying areas. Locations impacted include... Gatesville, Sunbury, Hobbsville, Easons Crossroads, Acorn Hill, Peach, Whiteston, Nicanor, Sandy Cross, Carter, Hickory Crossroads and Trotville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
